chapters.title: Chapter 1: Welcome to Your Reading Journey
text: Hi there! I am FluentBuddy, and I am excited to go on this reading journey with you!
Are you ready to become a Reading Champion and an Active Learner?
Come, let us unlock the secrets of reading comprehension together!
objectives: The meaning of reading comprehension and why it matters.
How your brain grows stronger when you learn.
What it means to be an active learner.
The difference between fiction and non-fiction texts.
How to paraphrase ideas using your own words.
How to use a glossary to understand new words.

glossary.definition: Being fully focused and involved while learning.
glossary.simple: Paying close attention and taking part when you learn.
glossary.example: I show engagement in class when I listen carefully and take part in activities.
